orig_text:
Smaller zones, or large
but relatively static zones, are encouraged to not use the opt-opt
flag and to take advantage of DNSSEC's authenticated denial of
existence.
correct_text:
Smaller zones, or large
but relatively static zones, are encouraged to not use the opt-out
flag and to take advantage of DNSSEC's authenticated denial of
existence.
notes: There is a typo, "opt-opt" should be "opt-out".

orig_text:
[ZONEENUM] Wang, Z., Xiao, L., and R. Wang, "An efficient DNSSEC zone
              enumeration algorithm", DOI 10.2495/MIIT130591, April
              2014, <https://doi.org/10.2495/MIIT130591>.
correct_text:
No alternative, the link above does not work (redirects to the 
home page  of a publisher) and I did not find this article 
online.
notes:
So much for the marketing "DOI provides stable identifiers".
 --VERIFIER NOTES-- 
 The link was valid at the publication time. Also, no alternative link is provided.
